targetButton.hint-false:
[Click] Add current targets to the message.
[Right-Click] Replace the targets in the message with current targets.
targetButton.hint-true:
[Click] Replace the targets in the message with current targets.
[Right-Click] Add current targets to the message.

splashButton.hint:
[Click] Select tokens for splash damage.
[Right-Click] Adjust radius and target before selecting.

hideNPCs.name: Hide non-Player Token Targets
hideNPCs.hint: Hides not owned by players tokens from the target list of a damage roll.

targetButton.name: Flip Target Button Behavior
targetButton.hint: Flips the Target Button Behavior to replace the existing targets, rather than adding up to the existing list.

hideTheHidingButtons.name: Hide Collapsible Buttons
hideTheHidingButtons.hint: Hides the added buttons to collapse damage button rows. If you enable any of the settings below, you won't be able to reveal the hidden buttons.

hideOGButtons.name: Hide Original PF2e Damage Buttons
hideOGButtons.hint: Hides the original PF2e system damage buttons.

persistentDamageInt.name: Integrate with Persistent Damage
persistentDamageInt.hint: Hides the original PF2e system damage buttons, but only Persistent Damage damage rolls.

classic.name: Use Classic Name Layout
classic.hint: Puts names on top of the buttons instead of it being compact on the left.
